gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem.AbstractTerm
      • gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SemanticItem, Term, java.lang.Comparable<SemanticItem>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Expression

    public class Entity
extends AbstractTerm
    Implementation of a basic, textually grounded named entity, with potential mappings to an ontology (i.e., instances of Concept class).
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Detail

      • getConcepts

        public java.util.Set<Concept> getConcepts()
        A concept refers to the ontological information associated with the entity term. It can be thought of as analogous to a UMLS concept.
        Returns:
        the set of concepts associated with the entity term

      • setConcepts

        public void setConcepts(java.util.Set<Concept> concepts)

      • getSense

        public Concept getSense()
        An entity term may correspond to multiple concepts (polysemy), but for processing purposes, only one of them is active at a time. The active concept is called the sense. In the course of interpretation, the term sense can be changed.
        Returns:
        the sense associated with the term

      • setSense

        public void setSense(Concept sense)

      • getSemtypes

        public java.util.LinkedHashSet<java.lang.String> getSemtypes()
        Finds the active semantic types (i.e., those associated with the sense). Returns the term type if no sense is selected.
        Returns:
        the active semantic types

      • getAllSemtypes

        public java.util.LinkedHashSet<java.lang.String> getAllSemtypes()
        Finds all semantic types (i.e., those associated with the concepts). Returns the term type if no concept is associated with the term
        Returns:
        all semantic types

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • toShortString

        public java.lang.String toShortString()
        Returns:
        the string representation for debugging

      • toXml

        public nu.xom.Element toXml()
        Returns:
        the XML representation

      • toStandoffAnnotation

        public java.lang.String toStandoffAnnotation(boolean withConcepts,
                                             int refId)
        Returns standoff annotation for this entity. This method allows adding concept information to standoff annotation as well. Concept information will be added as a reference item.
        Parameters:
        withConcepts - whether to include concept information
        refId - the beginning identifier to use for the concepts in standoff format
        Returns:
        the text representation of this entity in standoff annotation format

      • ontologyEquals

        public boolean ontologyEquals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Parameters:
        obj - another semantic item
        Returns:
        true if ontological information associated with the current item is the same as that associated with obj

      • getOntology

        public Ontology getOntology()
        Description copied from interface: SemanticItem
        Gets the ontological information associated with the semantic item. This is an abstract Indicator in the case of a Predicate, and a Concept in the case of an Entity.
        Returns:
        the abstract ontological information (no spans) associated with the semantic item

      • modifySense

        public void modifySense(java.lang.String semtype)
        Selects a new sense for the term.
        Parameters:
        semtype - the semantic type of the sense to associate
